participants.name: John Kelly
participants.description: Regional Affiliate Manager at National Center for Women & Information Technology (NCWIT)
participants.url: Former Business Associate at University of Colorado Boulder

messages.message:
Brian
Hello!
Hello Brian Cullinan

Brian
Can you do me a favor?
You have the perfect mind for this.
I guess it depends on the favor

Brian
Can you tell David Smith that he is a really cool dude?
hell yeah I can do that

Brian
lol
i knew it
I need your help
you are so hilarious I didn't appreciate it before.

Brian
Here is what I am thinking.  FB has become bad at personal conversations.  With so many users you would think it would be more personal.  I am thinking to spread compliments to counteract the bullshit from the media.  If people spend more time having a personal conversation all the noise from the media will begin to fade.  I've started practicing on Atheist Beings forum because whats harder than confronting negativing in religion?

Brian
Step 1) say nice things, Step 2) ask people what they want to do to make them more likely to actually do it, Step 3) ...? Step 4) Solve every world problem
I wonder if David will get it
Have you ever sent a gift on behalf of someone else?
I am testing this and then I will try that if this works.

of course I have but it's normally more random
like a stranger giving my friend a belt back

Brian
lol that is pretty good.  Good connection.  I don't know that I ever have.

or once I had one of my friends knock on my other friend's door (who they didn't know) ask to use their bathroom, and leave the gift in their
there*

Brian
lol

it normally works so hopefully this works for you
and you can save the world

Brian
you are the Jedi I have been looking for.
Exactly!
You can save the world.
I think so many people are lacking personal connections.  What have you been up to for 6 years?

that is a good question
I am in Boulder now working for a woman's rights group and it rocks
what are you up to?

Brian
Just got laid off,

shit fuck
sorry to hear that

Brian
That's ok had an interview at PNNL

Brian
We might have to play this game again later  thanks for your help!
